artifacts.summary: Complete terminology refactoring: BFMCS->FMCS, BMCS->BFMCS, Boneyard cleanup

completion_data.completion_summary: Completed full terminology refactoring across 624+ occurrences in 40+ files. Renamed BFMCS (family) to FMCS and BMCS (bundle) to BFMCS. Moved CoherentConstruction.lean to Boneyard, reducing active axiom count from 2 to 1. All 7 phases completed successfully with lake build passing.
roadmap_items: Refactor metalogic terminology (BMCS->BFMCS, FMCS, MCS) and archive to Boneyard
